review: ***** ******* Each visit has been satisfactory, he gives plenty of time and his full attention at each visit. Has not prescribed too many antibiotics. He is patient with his explanations and instructions. Happy that Dr. Rajeev consults at Apple Clinic, Malleshpalya.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I took appointment with the doctor after checking the review on Practo but the reviews were totally opposite to what I felt . ****** ** *** ******* **** ***** **** * ***** *** **** *** ** *** **** *** ******* *** *** ** ** *** **** ** * *** ***** **** *** ******* ** **** *** *****  .

I visited Manipal hospital , Whitefield on Sunday after taking the appointment.  I was late by 30 minutes and doctor went for a round and we waited for 30 more minutes to get our turn. That was absolutely fine. Patients who have not taken prior appointment were asked to go through emergency  (I did not understand the reason ) route.

It was fine until few minutes of the consultation as he was asking to get some test done and refer to some other doctor but when we started asking additional questions , he started getting irritated. He was arguing like for the queries you can come some other day as it is Sunday for me also . * ** *** ********** ** *** **** ** ********* ****** * *** *** *** ******* ****** ** **** *** ****** ** **** *** **** *** ******* **** *** **** ****** *** ***** * ******* ** * ****  Dynamically Charge the patient on the number of question they ask. 

I do not recommend the doctor *** **** ** ******** **** ** **** ***** *** *** **** ***** ******* **** *** ******* *** ** ****** *** *** Doctor should at least listen to the patient , give correct advice , and answer their queries. This doctor getting irritated with only 4-5 patient *** *** **** ** ****** *** ***** *** ***** ** ***** ******** ** *** ***  **** ***** ******* **** ** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
First visit was for cough , second one for my kid Laviths fungal infection - **** ******* ********* *** ******* ********** 
He is a real nice Doctor , soft spoken 
Cough is in control and infection is all gone
His explanation of current problem, simple medication and then explanation on next steps is a great relief to Parents in tension while the kids health is upset 
Thank you Doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have 5yrs daughter and have started consulting the doctor from past 8months. Dr Rajeeev is an excellent doctor, listens to your concerns very patiently, prescribes right medicines, avoids antibiotics, shares detailed explanation about the disease, provides right instructions. I would recommend the doctor to all parents for pediatric consultation. Thank you.

review: We consulted the doctor for our six month's old cough and cold. Doctor was friendly and patient. We are satisfied with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rajeev is really nice and capable doctor. I went thr for my daughter. Another Dr has already prescribed to admit my daughter for iv treatment. And then we consulted Dr. Rajeev for the 1st time to get 2nd opinion. Dr. Rajeev recommended us to wait for 1 week and try his medication. His medication worked.He is really friendly an calm. Most recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: we had our baby admitted in ICU. She had a bad infection and got very sick partly due to our ignorance also. After seeing in OP, Dr Rajeev immediately got her admitted and started treatment fast. Thanks to him our baby became better in 2 days. we would like to extend our heartfelt thanks and gratitude to Dr Rajeev, other junior doctors and all nurses in ICU and ward

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am consulting Dr Rajeev for almost 2 years. He is very patient and gives ample time to discuss symptoms and explains the reasons. He makes sure that the parents understand the issue and medicine needed. No unnecessary medicines or antibiotics. Very happy consulting Dr Rajeev for my kid.
